description: ENISA Failures or Malfuctions (EFM) - Failure of IT assets or their parts.

values.description: Threat of failure or malfunction of communications links. Failure of cable networks. Failure of wireless networks. Failure of mobile networks.
values.value: EFM 2 - Failure or Disruption of Communication Links

values.description: Threat of failure or disruption of supply required for information systems. Failure or disruption of the power supply. Failure of cooling infrastructure.
values.value: EFM 3 - Failure or Disruption of Main Supply

values.description: Threat of failure or disruption of thire party services required for proper operation of information systems.
values.value: EFM 4 - Failure or Disruption of Services Providers or Supply Chain

values.description: Threat of malfunction of IT hardware and/or software assets or its parts.
values.value: EFM 5 - Malfunction of Equipment, Devices, or Systems

values.description: Threat of failure of IT hardware or software assets or its parts. Failure of defective data media. Hardware failure. Failure of applications and services. Failure of parts of devices (connectors, plug in).
values.value: EFM 1 - Failure of Devices or Systems
